amendment.description: Amendment requires DOD to preserve current active ICBM silos in warm status.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to require DOD to preserve current active ICBM silos in warm status.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 189 (Roll no. 223).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lummis amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 189 (Roll no. 223).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Lummis.
